statements: SELECT * FROM ticket_sales;
SELECT passenger_name, ticket_price FROM ticket_sales WHERE seat_number = 3;
SELECT ticket_id, passenger_name, purchase_date FROM ticket_sales WHERE ticket_price > 100;
SELECT * FROM ticket_sales WHERE purchase_date >= '2022-01-01' AND purchase_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT passenger_name, seat_number FROM ticket_sales WHERE purchase_date = CURRENT_DATE;
SELECT ticket_id, passenger_name, ticket_price, seat_number, purchase_date FROM ticket_sales WHERE ticket_price > 100 ORDER BY purchase_date DESC
SELECT * FROM ticket_sales WHERE seat_number = 10 ORDER BY passenger_name ASC
SELECT passenger_name, purchase_date, seat_number FROM ticket_sales WHERE purchase_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY seat_number
SELECT ticket_id, passenger_name, ticket_price FROM ticket_sales WHERE ticket_price < 50 ORDER BY ticket_price ASC, passenger_name DESC
SELECT passenger_name, ticket_price, purchase_date FROM ticket_sales WHERE passenger_name LIKE 'J%' ORDER BY purchase_date
SELECT * FROM passenger_info;
SELECT passenger_name, email FROM passenger_info WHERE age > 30;
SELECT * FROM ticket_sales WHERE ticket_price > 100;
SELECT passenger_name, ticket_price FROM ticket_sales ORDER BY ticket_price DESC;
SELECT passenger_name, departure_date FROM ticket_sales WHERE departure_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM ticket_sales WHERE ticket_price > 100 ORDER BY departure_date DESC;
SELECT passenger_name, age FROM passenger_info WHERE age > 30;
SELECT passenger_name, email FROM passenger_info WHERE passenger_name LIKE 'J%' AND age < 40;
SELECT ticket_id, passenger_name, ticket_price FROM ticket_sales JOIN passenger_info ON ticket_sales.passenger_name = passenger_info.passenger_name;
SELECT passenger_name, ticket_price FROM ticket_sales WHERE departure_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM ticket_sales;
SELECT passenger_name, ticket_price FROM ticket_sales WHERE seat_number = 10;
SELECT flight_number, origin, destination FROM flights WHERE departure_time > '10:00:00';
SELECT passenger_name, email, phone_number FROM passengers WHERE passenger_id = 5;
SELECT ticket_id, passenger_name, ticket_price FROM ticket_sales ORDER BY departure_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM ticket_sales WHERE ticket_id = 10;
SELECT passenger_name, ticket_price FROM ticket_sales WHERE departure_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT passenger_name, email, phone_number FROM passengers ORDER BY passenger_name ASC;
SELECT flight_number, origin, destination FROM flights WHERE departure_time BETWEEN '08:00:00' AND '12:00:00';
SELECT passenger_name, ticket_price, seat_number FROM ticket_sales WHERE seat_number IN (1, 2, 3) ORDER BY ticket_price DESC;
SELECT * FROM tickets;
SELECT ticket_id, passenger_name, ticket_price FROM tickets WHERE ticket_price > 100;
SELECT passenger_name, purchase_date FROM tickets ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM boarding_pass WHERE seat_number = 'A12';
SELECT flight_number, departure_city, arrival_city FROM flights WHERE departure_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM tickets;
SELECT ticket_id, passenger_name, seat_number FROM tickets WHERE ticket_price > 1000;
SELECT passenger_name, purchase_date FROM tickets ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;

SELECT passenger_name, flight_number, departure_city, arrival_city FROM passengers JOIN boarding_pass ON passengers.passenger_id = boarding_pass.passenger_id JOIN flights ON boarding_pass.flight_id = flights.flight_id;
SELECT passenger_name, phone_number, address FROM passengers WHERE passenger_email LIKE '%gmail.com%' ORDER BY passenger_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM Tickets;
SELECT ticket_id, passenger_name, price FROM Tickets WHERE price > 100;
SELECT passenger_name, seat_number FROM Tickets ORDER BY passenger_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM Flights WHERE departure_city = 'New York';
SELECT passenger_name, email, phone_number FROM Passengers WHERE phone_number IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM Tickets WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT passenger_name, seat_number, price FROM Tickets WHERE ticket_id = 5;
SELECT flight_id, departure_city, arrival_city FROM Flights WHERE departure_date > '2023-01-01' AND arrival_date < '2023-12-31';
SELECT passenger_name, email FROM Passengers WHERE phone_number LIKE '%555%' AND address IS NOT NULL;
SELECT airline_name, website, contact_number FROM Airlines ORDER BY airline_name ASC;
